A Thousand Cuts.Description: Whenever you play a card, deal 1 (2) damage to ALL enemies.

After Image.Description: (Innate).Whenever you play a card, gain 1 Block.

All Out Attack.Description: Deal 10 (14) damage to ALL enemies. Draw 1 less card next turn.

Ancient Tea Set.Description: Whenever you enter a Rest Site, start the next combat with 2 Energy.

Anger.Description: Deal 4(6) damage. Place a copy of this card in your discard pile.

Apotheosis.Description: Upgrade ALL of your cards for the rest of combat. Exhaust.

Armaments.Description: Gain 5 Block. Upgrade a(ALL) card(s) in your hand for the rest of combat.

Art of War.Description: If you do not play any Attacks during your turn, gain an extra Energy next turn.

Astrolabe.Description: Upon pickup, choose and Transform 3 cards, then Upgrade them.

Bag of Marbles.Description: At the start of each combat, apply 1 Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

Bag of Preparation.Description: At the start of each combat, draw 2 additional cards.

Bane.Description: Deal 7 (10) damage. If the enemy is Poisoned, deal 7 (10) damage again.

Barricade.Description: Block no longer expires at the start of your turn.

Bash.Description: Deal 8(10) damage. Apply Vulnerable for 2(3) turns.

Battle Trance.Description: Draw 3(4) cards. You cannot draw additional cards this turn.

Berserk.Description: If your HP is below 50%, gain 1 energy at the start of each turn.

Bird-Faced Urn.Description: Whenever you play a Power, heal 2 HP.

Black Blood.Description: Replaces Burning Blood. At the end of combat, heal 10 HP.

Black Star.Description: Elites now drop 2 Relics when defeated.

Blood Vial.Description: At the start of each combat, heal 2 HP.

Blood for Blood.Description: Cost 1 less energy for each time you lose HP in combat. Deal 16(18) damage.

Bloody Idol.Description: Whenever you gain Gold, heal 5 HP.

Blue Candle.Description: Curse cards can now be played. Playing a Curse will make you lose 1 HP and Exhausts the card.

Blur.Description: Gain 5(8) Block. Block is not removed at the start of your next turn.

Body Slam.Description: Deal damage equal to your current Block.

Bottled Flame.Description: Upon pick up, choose an Attack card. At the start of each combat, this card will be in your hand.

Bottled Lightning.Description: Upon pick up, choose a Skill card. At the start of each combat, this card will be in your hand.

Bottled Tornado.Description: Upon pick up, choose a Power card. At the start of each combat, this card will be in your hand.

Brazing Flask|Bouncing Flask.Description: Apply 3 poison to a random enemy 3 (4) times.

Bronze Scales.Description: Whenever you take damage, deal 3 damage back.

Brutality.Description: (Innate) At the start of your turn, lose 1 HP and draw 1 card.

Bullet Time.Description: You cannot draw any cads this turn. Reduce the cost of cards in your hand to 0 this turn.

Burn.Description: Unplayable.At the end of your turn, take 2 (4) damage.

Burning Blood.Description: At the end of combat, heal 6 HP.

Burst.Description: This turn your next 1 Skill is (2 Skill|Skills are) played twice.

Calculated Gamble.Description: Discard your hand, then draw that many cards.Exhaust.(non-exhaust)

Calipers.Description: At the start of your turn, lose 15 Block rather than all of your Block.

Caltrops.Description: Whenever you are attacked, deal 3 (5) damage to the attacker.

Centennial Puzzle.Description: The first time you lose HP each combat, draw 3 cards.

Champion Belt.Description: Whenever you apply Vulnerable, also apply 1 Weak.

Charon's Ashes.Description: Whenever you Exhaust a card, deal 3 damage to ALL enemies.

Choke.Description: Deal 12 damage. Whenever you play a card this turn, targeted enemy loses 3 (5) HP.

Clash.Description: Can only be played if every card in your hand is an Attack. Deal 14(18) damage.

Cloak And Dagger.Description: Gain 6 Block|Bblock|lock. Add 1 Shiv (2 Shiv|Shivs) to your hand.

Combust.Description: At the end of your turn, lose 1 HP and deal 4(5) damage to ALL enemies.

Corpse Explosion.Description: Enemy loses all Poison. Deal damage equal to twice (3 times) the amount lost to ALL enemies.

Corruption.Description: Skills cost 0. Whenever you play a Skill, Exhaust it.

Cursed Key.Description: Gain 1 Energy at the start of each turn. Whenever you open a non-boss chest, obtain a Curse.

Dagger Spray.Description: Deal 4 (6) damage to ALL enemies twice.

Dagger Throw.Description: Deal 9 (12) damage. Draw 1 card. Discard 1 card.

Dark Embrace.Description: Whenever a card is Exhausted, draw 1 card.

Dark Shackles.Description: Enemy loses 9 strength for the rest of this turn. Exhaust.

Darkstone Periapt.Description: Whenever you obtain a Curse, increase your Max HP by 6.

Dead Branch.Description: Whenever you Exhaust a card, add a random card to your hand.

Decay.Description: Unplayable.At the end of your turn, take 2 damage.

Deep Breath.Description: Shuffle your discard pile into your draw pile. Draw 1 card

Demon Form.Description: At the start of each turn, gain 2(3) Strength.

Die Die Die.Description: Deal 13 (17) damage to ALL enemies. Exhaust.

Distraction.Description: Add a random Skill to your hand. It costs 0 this turn. Exhaust.

Dodge and Roll.Description: Gain 4 (6) Block. Next turn gain 4 (6) Block.

Doppelganger.Description: Next turn, draw X(+1) cards and gain X(+1) Energy.

Double Tap.Description: This turn, your next (2) Attack(s) is played twice.

Doubt.Description: Unplayable.At the end of your turn, gain 1 weak.

Dramatic Entrance.Description: Innate. Deal 6(8) damage to all enemies. Exhaust.

Dream Catcher.Description: Whenever you rest, you may add a card to your deck.

Dropkick.Description: Deal 5(8) damage. If the target is Vulnerable, gain 1 energy and draw 1 card.

Du-Vu Doll.Description: For each Curse in your deck, start each combat with 1 additional Strength.

Dual Wield.Description: Create a(2) copy(s) of a card in your hand.

Ectoplasm.Description: Gain 1 Energy at the start of each turn. You can no longer gain Gold.

Enchiridion.Description: Start each combat with a random Power card in your hand. It costs 0 until the end of turn.

Endless Agony.Description: Whenever you draw this card, add a copy of it to your hand. Deal 4 (6) damage. Exhaust.

Enlightenment.Description: Reduce the cost of cards in your hand to 1 this turn(combat).

Envenom.Description: Whenever an attack deals unblocked damage, apply 1 Poison.

Escape Plan.Description: Draw 1 card. If the card is a Skill, gain 3 (5) Block.

Eternal Feather.Description: For every 5 cards in your deck, heal 2 HP whenever you enter a Rest Site.

Eviscerate.Description: Costs 1 less Energy for each card discarded this turn. Deal 6 (8) damage three times.

Evolve.Description: Shuffle 2 Wounds into your draw pile. Whenever you draw a Wound, draw 1(2) card(s).

Exhume.Description: Choose an Exhausted card and put it in your hand. Exhaust.

Feed.Description: Deal 10(12) damage. If this kills the enemy, gain 3(4) permanent Max HP.

Feel No Pain.Description: Whenever a card is Exhausted, gain 4(6) Block.

Fiend Fire.Description: Exhaust your hand. Deal 7(10) damage for each Exhausted card. Exhaust.

Finisher.Description: Deal 6 (8) damage for each Attack played this turn.

Fire Breathing.Description: At the end of your turn, for each Attack played this turn deal 1 damage to ALL enemies.

Flame Barrier.Description: Gain 12(16) Block. Whenever you are attacked this turn, deal 4 damage to the attacker.

Flechettes.Description: Deal 4 (6) damage for each Skill in your hand.

Flex.Description: Gain 2(4) Strength. At the end of your turn, lose 2(4) Strength.

Flying Knee.Description: Deal 8 (11) damage. Next turn gain 1 Energy.

Frozen Egg.Description: Upon pick up, choose and Upgrade a Power.

Frozen Eye.Description: When viewing your Draw Pile, the cards are now shown in order.

Gambling Chip.Description: At the start of each combat, discard any number of cards then draw that many.

Ginger.Description: You can no longer become Weakened.

Girya.Description: You can now gain Strength at Rest Sites. (3 times max)

Glass Knife.Description: Deal 8 (12) damage twice. Glass Knife's damage is lowered by 2 this combat.

Grand Finale.Description: Can only be played if there are no cards in your draw pile. Deal 40 (50) damage to ALL enemies.

Gremlin Horn.Description: Whenever an enemy dies, gain 1 Energy and draw 1 card.

Havoc.Description: Play the top card of your draw pile and Exhaust it.

Headbutt.Description: Deal 9(12) damage. Place a card from your discard pile on top of your draw pile.

Heavy Blade.Description: Deal 14 damage. Strength affects Heavy Blade 3(5) times.

Heel Hook.Description: Deal 5 (7) damage. If the enemy is Weak, Gain 1 Energy and draw 1 card.

Ice Cream.Description: Energy is now conserved between turns.

Immolate.Description: Exhaust 1 card. If the chosen card was a Status or Curse, deal 10(15) damage to ALL enemies.

Infernal Blade.Description: Add a random Attack to your hand. It costs 0 this turn. Exhaust.

Infinite Blades.Description: (Innate).At the start of your turn, add a Shiv to your hand.

Intimidate.Description: Apply 1(2) Weak to ALL enemies. Exhaust.

J.A.X.|J.A.X.Description: Lose 3 HP. Gain 2(3) strength.Exhaust. ''(Obtained from event.)''

Jack Of All Trades.Description: Add a(2) random colorless card to your hand. Exhaust.

Juggernaut.Description: Whenever you gain Block, deal 3(5) damage to ALL enemies.

Juzu Bracelet.Description: Regular enemy combats are no longer encountered in ? rooms.

Kunai.Description: Every time you play 3 Attacks in a single turn, gain 1 Dexterity.

Lantern.Description: Gain 1 Energy on the first turn of each combat.

Lee's Waffle.Description: Raise your Max HP by 7 and heal all of your HP.

Letter Opener.Description: Every time you play 3 Skills in a single turn, deal 5 damage to ALL enemies.

Lizard Tail.Description: When you would die, heal to 50% of your Max HP instead (works once).

Madness.Description: A random card in your hand costs 0 for the rest of combat. Exhaust.

Magic Flower.Description: Healing is 50% more effective during combat.

Malaise.Description: Spend all Energy. Enemy loses X (+1) Strength. Apply X (+1) Weak. Exhaust.

Mark of Pain.Description: Gain 1 Energy at the start of each turn. Start combats with 2 Wounds in your draw pile.

Masterful Stab.Description: Can only be played if there are no other cards in your hand. Deal 15 (20) damage.

Matryoshka.Description: The next 2 Chest|chests you open contain 2 Relics. (Excludes boss chests)

Meat on the Bone.Description: If your HP is at or below 50% at the end of combat, heal 12 HP.

Medical Kit.Description: Statuses|Status cards can now be played. Playing a Status will Exhaust the card.

Membership Card.Description: In future acts, shops appear 50% more often. BONUS: 20% discount on all products!

Mercury Hourglass.Description: At the start of your turn, deal 3 damage to ALL enemies.

Metallicize.Description: At the end of your turn, gain 3(4) Block.

Mind Blast.Description: Deal damage equal to the number of cards in your draw pile.

Molten Egg.Description: Upon pick up, choose and Upgrade an Attack.

Mummified Hand.Description: Whenever you play a Power, a random card in your hand costs 0 for the turn.

Necronomicon.Description: The first Attack played each turn that costs 2 or more is played twice. When you take this relic, become Cursed.

Necronomicurse.Description: Unplayable.There is no escape from this Curse.

Neow's Lament.Description: Enemies in your first 3 combats will have 1 HP.

Nightmare.Description: Choose a card.Next turn, add 3 copies of that card into your hand.Exhaust.

Nilry's Codex.Description: At the end of each turn, you can choose 1 of 3 random cards to shuffle into your draw pile.

Ninja Scroll.Description: Start each combat with 3 Shivs in hand.

Nloth's Gift.Description: Triples the chance of receiving rare cards as monster rewards.

Normality.Description: Unplayable.You cannot play more than 3 cards this turn.

Noxious Fumes.Description: At the start of your turn, apply 2 (3) Poison to ALL enemies.

Odd Mushroom.Description: When Vulnerable, take 25% more damage rather than 50%.

Oddly Smooth Stone.Description: At the start of each combat, gain 1 Dexterity.

Offering.Description: Lose 4 HP. Gain 2 energy. Draw 3(5) cards. Exhaust.

Omamori.Description: Negate the next 2 Curses you obtain.

Orichalcum.Description: If you end your turn without Block, gain 6 Block.

Ornamental Fan.Description: Every time you play 3 Attacks in a single turn, gain 4 Block.

Orrery.Description: Choose and add 5 cards to your deck.

Pain.Description: Unplayable.While in hand, lose 1 HP when other cards are played.

Panache.Description: Every time you play 5 cards in a single turn, deal 10(14) damage to ALL enemies.

Pantograph.Description: At the start of Bosses|boss combats, heal 25 HP.

Paper Krane.Description: Enemies with Weak deal 50% less damage rather than 25%.

Paper Phrog.Description: Enemies with Vulnerable take 75% more damage rather than 50%.

Parasite.Description: Unplayable.If transformed or removed from your deck, lose 3 Max HP.

Peace Pipe.Description: You can now remove cards from your deck at Rest Sites.

Pen Nib.Description: Every 10th Attack you play deals double damage.

Perfected Strike.Description: Deal 6 damage. Deals an additional +2(3) damage for ALL of your cards containing "Strike".

Phantasmal Killer.Description: On your next turn, your Attack damage is doubled.

Philosopher's Stone.Description: Gain 1 Energy at the start of each turn. ALL enemies start with 2 Strength.

Piercing Wail.Description: ALL enemies lose 6 (8) Strength for 1 turn. Exhaust.

Power Through.Description: Add 2 Wounds to your hand. Gain 15(20) Block.

Prayer Wheel.Description: Non-Boss chests now also contain cards.

Predator.Description: Deal 15 (20) damage. Draw 2 more cards next turn.

Purity.Description: Choose and exhaust 3(5) cards in your hand. Exhaust.

Question Card.Description: On Card Reward screens, choose from 4 cards instead of 3.

Rage.Description: Whenever you play an Attack this turn, gain 4(6) Block

Rampage.Description: Deal 8 damage. Every time this card is played, increase its damage by 4(8) for this combat.

Reaper.Description: Deal 4(5) damage to ALL enemies. Heal for unBlocked damage. Exhaust.

Red Mask.Description: At the start of each combat, apply 1 Weak to ALL enemies.

Red Skull.Description: While your HP is at or below 50%, you have 3 additional Strength.

Reflex.Description: Unplayable. If this card is discarded from your hand, draw 1 card.

Regal Pillow.Description: Heal an additional 15 HP when you rest.

Regret.Description: Unplayable.At the end of your turn, lose 1 HP for each card in your hand.

Ring of the Snake.Description: At the start of each combat, draw 2 additional cards.

Runic Cube.Description: Max HP is lowered by 20%. Whenever you lose HP, draw 1 card.

Runic Dodecahedron.Description: If your HP is full, gain 1 Energy at the start of each turn.

Runic Dome.Description: Gain 1 Energy at the start of each turn. You can no longer see enemy Intents.

Runic Pyramid.Description: At the end of your turn, you no longer discard your hand. Draw 1 less card each turn.

Rupture.Description: Whenever you lose HP from a card, gain 1 Strength.

Sadistic Nature.Description: Whenever you apply a Debuff to an enemy, they take 3(4) damage.

Searing Blow.Description: Deal 12(16+) damage. Can be upgraded any number of times.

Second Wind.Description: Exhaust all non-Attack cards in your hand and gain 5(7) Block for each.

Secret Technique.Description: Choose a Skill from your draw pile and place it into your hand. Exhaust(Don't Exhaust)

Secret Weapon.Description: Choose an Attack from your draw pile and place it into your hand. Exhaust(Don't Exhaust)

Self-Forming Clay.Description: Whenever you lose HP in combat, gain 3 Block next turn.

Sentinel.Description: Gain 5(8) Block. If this card is Exhausted, gain 2(3) energy.

Setup.Description: Place a card in your hand on top of your draw pile. It cost 0 until it is played.

Sever Soul.Description: Exhaust all non-Attack cards in your hand. Deal 16(20) damage.

Shiv.Description: Deal 4 damage. Exhaust. ''(Obtained from the effects of various cards.)''

Shockwave.Description: Apply 3(5) Weak and Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

Shovel.Description: You can now Dig for loot at Rest Sites.

Shuriken.Description: Every time you play 3 Attacks in a single turn, gain 1 Strength.

Singing Bowl.Description: Whenever you skip a card reward, increase your Max HP by 2.

Skewer.Description: Spend all Energy. Deal 7 (10) damage X times.

Smiling Mask.Description: The Merchant|merchant's card removal service now always costs 50 Gold.

Snecko Eye.Description: Draw 2 additional cards each turn. Start each combat Confused.

Snecko Skull.Description: Whenever you apply Poison, apply an additional 1 Poison.

Sozu.Description: Gain 1 Energy at the start of each turn. You can no longer use potions.

Spot Weakness.Description: If an enemy intends to attack, gain 3(4) Strength.

Storm of Steel.Description: Discard your hand. Add 1 (Upgraded) Shiv to your hand for each card discarded.

Strange Spoon.Description: Cards which Exhaust when played will instead discard 50% of the time.

Sundial.Description: Every 3 times you shuffle your deck, gain 2 Energy.

Sword Boomerang.Description: Deal 3 damage to a random enemy 3(4) times.

Tactician.Description: Unplayable. If this card is discarded from your hand, gain 1 Energy.

The Courier.Description: The Merchant|merchant no longer runs out of cards, relics, or potions and his prices are reduced by 20%.

The Specimen.Description: Whenever an enemy dies, transfer any Poison it has to a random enemy.

Thinking Ahead.Description: Draw 2 cards. Place a card from your hand on top of your draw pile. Exhaust.

Thread and Needle.Description: At the start of each combat, gain 5 Plated Armor.

Thunderclap.Description: Deal 4(7) damage and apply 1 Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

Tingsha.Description: Whenever you discard a card during your turn, deal 3 damage to a random enemy for each card discarded.

Tiny Chest.Description: Gain 30 Gold. You are 10% more likely to find treasure in Map Locations|? rooms.

Tiny House.Description: Obtain 1 potion. Gain 30 Gold. Raise your Max HP by 5. Obtain 1 card.

Toolbox.Description: At the start of each combat, add a random Neutral cards|colorless card to your hand.

Tools of the Trade.Description: At the start of your turn, draw 1 card and discard 1 card.

Torii.Description: Whenever you would receive 5 or less unblocked Attack damage, reduce it to 1.

Tough Bandages.Description: Whenever you Discard|discard a card during your turn, gain 3 Block.

Toxic Egg.Description: Upon pick up, choose and Upgrade a Skill.

Toy Ornithopter.Description: Whenever you use a potion, heal 3 HP.

Transmutation.Description: Add X random (upgraded) colorless cards into your hand. Exhaust.

True Grit.Description: Gain 7(9) Block. Exhaust a random(not random) card from your hand.

Unceasing Top.Description: Whenever you have no cards in hand during your turn, draw a card.

Underhanded Strike.Description: Unplayable. If this card is discarded from your hand, deal 7 (10) damage to a random enemy.

Unload.Description: Deal 12 (16) damage. Discard ALL non-Attack cards.

Uppercut.Description: Deal 13 damage. Apply 1(2) Weak. Apply 1(2) Vulnerable.

Vajra.Description: At the start of each combat, gain 1 Strength.

Velvet Choker.Description: Gain 1 Energy at the start of each turn. You cannot play more than 6 cards per turn.

War Paint.Description: Upon pick up, Upgrade 2 random Skills.

Warcry.Description: Draw 2 cards. Place a card from your hand on top of your draw pile. Exhaust.

Well-Laid Plans.Description: At the end of your turn, Retain up to 1 card.

Whetstone.Description: Upon pick up, Upgrade 2 random Attacks.

Whirlwind.Description: Spend all energy. Deal 5(8) damage to ALL enemies X times.

Wild Strike.Description: Deal 12(17) damage. Shuffle a Wound into your draw pile.

Wraith Form.Description: Whenever you play a Skill, deal 3 (5) damage to a random enemy.
